active_currency_id.description: ID of the currency actively in use in the storefront.

active_currency_flag.description: Country flag used to represent the active currency.

currencies.description: List of all the currencies supported for this storefront.

is_active.description: Boolean that indicates whether this currency is active for use in the storefront

switch_url.description: The URL to invoke a switch to this currency.

flag.description: Country flag used to visually represent the currency.
